# Education

```{r}
edu <- do.call("rbind", rorcid::orcid_educations("0000-0001-9713-2330")$`0000-0001-9713-2330`$`affiliation-group`$summaries)


edu %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = `education-summary.role-title`,
    when = `education-summary.end-date.year.value`,
    with = `education-summary.organization.name`,
    where = paste0(`education-summary.organization.address.city`,", ",`education-summary.organization.address.region`)
  )

```


# Publications

```{r}
pubs <- scholar::get_publications("q3E1S9MAAAAJ") %>% 
  slice(-(n()-3):-n()) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(author = author %>% 
                  as.character %>% 
                  stringr::str_trim(),
                journal = journal, 
                first_author = case_when(stringr::str_starts(author, "JR Junker") ~ TRUE,
                                         TRUE ~ FALSE)) %>% 
  filter(title %ni% c("Freshwater processing of terrestrial dissolved organic matter: What governs lability?","RIVERINE DISSOLVED ORGANIC MATTER DECOMPOSITION AND DYNAMICS","Trophic basis of invertebrate production in a Northern Rockies stream with recent willow recovery")) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(desc(year))

pubs %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = year,
    with = author,
    where = journal, 
    .protect = TRUE
  )
```
